entries.content:
Fixed the webview 404 error by reverting incorrect import path changes. 

The previous session changed `../../core/events/events.js` to `../../../core/events/events.js` in 4 files, which made the browser look for `src/ui/core/events/events.js` instead of the correct `src/ui/modules/core/events/events.js`.

Fixed files:
- EventCoordinator.js:6
- SystemLifecycle.js:6  
- StatusController.js:13
- ConfirmationController.js:8

All reverted to correct `../../` paths. The fix is complete and ready to test by reloading the extension.

Found the REAL root cause: Browser is incorrectly resolving relative imports from EventCoordinator.js. 

When EventCoordinator.js (at src/ui/modules/ui-logic/coordination/) imports `../../core/events/events.js`, the browser resolves it to `src/ui/modules/ui-logic/core/events/events.js` instead of the correct `src/ui/modules/core/events/events.js`.

This is NOT a source code issue - the import paths in source are CORRECT. This is a BROWSER MODULE RESOLUTION issue with how VSCode webview handles relative ES6 imports.

The browser is incorrectly treating the base path as including `ui-logic/` when resolving the `../..` in the import.

Module Loading Chain Analysis:

1. base.html loads: src/ui/app/main.js
2. main.js imports: ../modules/ui-logic/UIManager.js → src/ui/modules/ui-logic/UIManager.js ✓
3. UIManager.js imports: ./coordination/EventCoordinator.js → src/ui/modules/ui-logic/coordination/EventCoordinator.js ✓
4. coordination/EventCoordinator.js imports: ../../core/events/events.js → src/ui/modules/core/events/events.js ✓

BUT ALSO:
3b. UIManager probably imports ChatTabManager somewhere
4b. ChatTabManager.js imports: ./chat-tab-manager/EventCoordinator.js → src/ui/modules/ui-logic/chat-tabs/chat-tab-manager/EventCoordinator.js ✓
5b. chat-tab-manager/EventCoordinator.js imports: ../../../core/events/events.js → SHOULD BE src/ui/modules/core/events/events.js BUT BROWSER RESOLVES TO src/ui/modules/ui-logic/core/events/events.js ✗

The browser is incorrectly resolving the ../../.. path from the chat-tab-manager EventCoordinator.
